News.page_title: Dagenham & Redbridge FC College Academy 2017/2018 Recruitment
News.URL_keywords: Dagenham & Redbridge FC College Academy 2017/2018 Recruitment
News.short_description: The Barking and Dagenham College Academy are recruiting for their Elite Team, for the 2017/2018 season.
News.description:
As an Academy student you will benefit from:
•    Study with a national award-winning College
•    Train with Dagenham & Redbridge FC professional coaches
•    Potential to trial and play for the Daggers Youth Team
•    Play in the highest youth league outside of professional academies (Football Conference Youth Alliance)
•    Train four times a week and play at one of our four Academy teams on Wednesdays
•    Be coached by Dagenham & Redbridge FC Academy Coaches UEFA B & A Licence
•    Gain youth team under 18's trials and first team development games
•    Represent the England College National team
•    Study at Level 2/3 and national sports courses with a chance to progress on to University
•    Get a chance to participate in our yearly residential Seville FC (Spain) tour
•    Get a chance to gain an American Football scholarship
•    Receive an FA Level 1 Coaching badge (part-time coaching experience)

Please fill in the form here, once your form has been returned all the trial information that is needed will be supplied to you including information on the time, venue, date, kit etc.

Information form that you MUST fill in and return as soon as possible (please fill in all questions).

Fill it in and email it back to: Joel.Oliver@bdc.ac.uk and jimmy.martin@bdc.ac.uk
